Get yourself a LinkGarden
A Fediverse Starter Pack

Bluesky has automated starter packs that you add users to in a list, that other users can click once in order to follow all. But, in the spirit of Mastodon, like others have done, and like me, someone who just likes writing things, Iâ€™ve made a manual starter pack, for the Fediverse!

Fedi following is a bit different if youâ€™re unfamiliar with it. Each link leads to the version of these accounts that exist on my instance via federation, but you can follow either by copying their usernames plus instance name, or by clicking the â€œFollowâ€ button on their profiles and entering the address to the instance youâ€™re currently logged into.
